mdRecord.dcterms:title: Harrison Awards research presentation
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Harrison, Peggy, 1960-
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Eight undergraduate students presented the results of their research in front of faculty and students at the Colonnade Club. They were some of the winners of the Harrison Awards. Front row, left to right: Faculty Senate Chair Rob Grainger, Environmental Sciences professor Deborah Lawrence and Laura Cacho. Second row, left to right: Esther Huang, Commonwealth Professor of Spanish David Gies, Elizabeth Whelan, and Poonam Sharma. Top row, left to right: Psychology professor David Hill, Chris Yuskaitis, Chemistry professor Michal Sabat, and Gregory Broughton
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Visual History Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
University of Virginia. News Office--Press coverage
